function deviceType() {

    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");

}

let sources = res[3];

	key = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key = getKey(key);
 } catch (e) {key='';}
        
        
let device,device_type;
try {
    device = java.androidId();
    device_type='安卓';
} catch (e) {
    try{
device = java.deviceID();
device_type='苹果';
}catch (e) {device = '';
device_type='安卓';
}
}
let sq_user_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'sq_user_id',String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '0';

let content_url;
if (tab=='小说') {
	content_url= `/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}&sq_user_id=${sq_user_id}`;
 } 
 else if (tab=='听书') {
 	 	content_url= `/audio?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&tone_id=${tone_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 	} else if (tab=='漫画') {
 		 	content_url=	`/pic?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 		} else if (tab=='短剧') {
 		content_url=	`/video?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 			}
 let data = java.ajax(base_url+content_url);
 try {
if (JSON.parse(data).msg) {
	java.toast(JSON.parse(data).msg);

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};

  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"

} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {

	media = "小说"

if (key.includes('@')) {
  const parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}

function getUrl(_) {
  const { java, source } =_|| this
  let v = String(source.getVariable())
  if(v.length < 1){
    source.setVariable("0")
    v = v.match(/^\d+$/) ? v : 0
  }
  return urls[v]
}

function getIndex(a){
	let i=urls.indexOf(a)+1
	return i
	}

 function getCode(){
 	 let app_signature_md5 = "f73576612783f8ed8b68cdf73a56be94";
  	let phone = result.get("账号");
  	let time = String(Date.now());	
  	
   let hashvalue = java.md5Encode(encode(phone+time));	
   let option = {
 	  "app_signature_md5":app_signature_md5,
   "app_version":"4.1.1",
   "channel":"default",
   "verify_type":"5", 
   "hashvalue":hashvalue,
   "username":phone,
   "timestamp":time
   }
   
   let body = "secret_content="+encode(JSON.stringify(option));
   let url = "https://app.shubl.com/signup/send_verify_code"
   try{
 let resposebody =	java.ajax(url+","+JSON.stringify({"method":"POST","body":body}));
 	let tip = JSON.parse(decode(resposebody)).tip;
 	java.toast(tip)
 	}catch(e){
 		java.log(e)
 		}
 	
 	}
 
 
 	
 function login(){
 	try{
 	let login_name=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号")
let code=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("验证码");
    let jsonStr = {
    	"app_signature_md5":"f73576612783f8ed8b68cdf73a56be94",
    	"app_version":"4.1.1",
    	"channel":"default",
    	"uuid":"android",
    	"ver_code":code,
    	"username":login_name
    	}
    
    
    let body = "secret_content=" + encode(JSON.stringify(jsonStr));
    let option = {
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body)
    };
    
    let url = "https://app.shubl.com/signup/verify_login," + JSON.stringify(option);
    
   let respbody = decode(java.ajax(url));
   java.log(respbody);
   let resp = JSON.parse(respbody);
   java.log(resp.tip);
   
   
    if (resp.code == "100000") {
     body = {
     	"login_token":resp.data.login_token,
     	"account":encodeURI(resp.data.reader_info.account)
     	}
     source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(body)) 
    } else {
        java.toast('❗️ ' + resp.tip + ' ❗️')
    }
    }catch(e){
    	java.log(e)
    	}
}
